The DurakGame class¶

class Game.DurakGame(numPlayers: int, deckMode: str)¶

Bases: Game.Game

State machine for game of Durak. Note, the agents here are called players since we haven’t implemented AI Agents (yet).

available actions given player

Parameters

playerID (int) – input player

getGameEnded()¶
Input:

players: current players

Returns

0 if game has not ended. 1 if there is only one player remaining (who has lost)

r

class Field.DurakField(deck, players)¶

Bases: Field.Field

  • deck (Deck) – the starting deck
